column3: The sum of the earnings (loss) per share for the four quarters differs from annual earnings per share due to the required method of computing the weighted average shares outstanding in interim periods.

Weighted average shares outstanding used in the computation of basic and diluted earnings (loss) per share and cash dividends declared per share for the years ended December 31, 2016 and 2015 was adjusted to reflect the 1-for-3Â reverse stock split that occurred on January 3, 2017. See Note 1: "Organization" for additional information.
